game.model

Class Engine

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.model.Engine

  • public class Engine
extends java.lang.Object
    Game engine. Holds current state of the game and contains its logic.
    Author:
    student

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentState

        public GameData getCurrentState()

      • randomValue

        public static int randomValue(int score)
        Random value for a tile, implements binomial distribution.
        Parameters:
        score - high score, used as the upper bound
        Returns:
        random value

      • bomb

        public void bomb(Coord coord)
          throws notEnoughException
        Bomb action. Checks if there is enough move-currency, then, if there is - replaces the tile, updates current state and turn archive accordingly.
        Parameters:
        coord - x and y of a tile that is to be removed
        Throws:
        notEnoughException - not enough move-currency

      • undo

        public void undo()
          throws notEnoughException
        Undo action. Checks if there is enough move-currency, then, if there is - gets previous gameState from the archive, stores all its content but the moves in the current state. Removes 2 last actions from the archive to achieve continuous undo-ing.
        Throws:
        notEnoughException - not enough move-currency

      • increment

        public void increment(Coord coord)
        Main game mechanic. Takes board coordinate of a click, checks for its adjacent equal-value tiles, if there is any, then checks for their adjacent tiles and increments the clicked one while removing the others and initiating the "fall". Each time a new high score is reached currently smallest by the value tile is replaced. Updates currentState and stores it in the archive.
        Parameters:
        coord - board-coordinate of the click

      • findAdjacentTiles

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Coord> findAdjacentTiles(java.lang.Integer[][] board,
                                                           Coord coord)
        A method that finds all neighboring tiles with the same value, i.e. all tiles around input coordinate eligible to removal.
        Parameters:
        board - 2-d list that represents the board
        coord - coordinate of a tile to search from
        Returns:
        list of neighboring coordinates

      • checkAdjacentTiles

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Coord> checkAdjacentTiles(java.lang.Integer[][] board,
                                                            Coord coord)
        A helper method used to find adjacent tiles around a single coordinate.
        Parameters:
        board - 2-d list that represents the board
        coord - coordinate of a tile to search from
        Returns:
        list of neighboring coordinates

      • findScoreTile

        public Coord findScoreTile()
        A method that returns the board coordinates of the high score tile. Used as an API for scorer AI.
        Returns:
        a coordinate of the high score tile

      • loadFromArchive

        public void loadFromArchive()
        Updates current gamestate with the last entry from the archive.
